title: S8 silver III adc main LF duo partner
body: Hey, I'm an ADC main LF a duo partner who can play a couple games regularly (pref time from 4 pm - 7 pm Perth time) and is around high bronze to low-mid silver, I used to one trick Xayah playing other ADC's occasionally but have recently been swapping between Xayah, Vayne, and Kai'sa. As a duo i would prefer someone who isn't very toxic, also0 I don't really care for role though I would pref support or something else that I can work with easy, also. my opgg is http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=ZombiSlayer and my ign is ZombiSlayer, Hit me up in either this thread or add me on game and we can try a few games out together. TY for checking this out and even if we don't duo GL to you on the rift!!!

replies.body:
hit me up fam
Been hittin up Nami a lot, but play a lot (like A LOT) of brand, leo and veiger sup <3
Always down to play
Hey, I just sent you a friend request, if you down to play some games tomorrow I should be on.
